title: Replace phone number 9888377403 with 9888955099 across WhatsApp and all contact links

requirements.text: Replace the phone number 9888377403 with 9888955099 everywhere in the frontend, including all displayed phone text, all tel: links, and all WhatsApp (wa.me) links, ensuring the country-code formatting remains consistent across display and link forms.

quotes: Replace 9888377403 with 9888955099 everywhere including WhatsApp and links

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/constants/contact.ts` is updated so that: `CONTACT.phone.display` becomes "+91 9888955099", `CONTACT.phone.number` becomes "919888955099", and `CONTACT.phone.tel` becomes "tel:+919888955099".

`frontend/src/constants/contact.ts` is updated so that: `CONTACT.whatsapp.url` becomes "https://wa.me/919888955099" and `CONTACT.whatsapp.urlWithMessage` becomes "https://wa.me/919888955099?text=Hi,%20I%20have%20a%20query%20about%20your%20services!" (same prefilled message as before).
The floating WhatsApp button uses the updated WhatsApp URL with message (via `CONTACT.whatsapp.urlWithMessage`) and opens the chat to the new number.
A repo-wide check confirms there are no remaining occurrences of "9888377403" or "919888377403" in frontend source files or user-facing links.

constraints: Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not edit any paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change any other contact fields (email, location) or unrelated page content.
Do not add new authentication, routing, or backend features.
